地对空导弹瞄具(SAMSight) : FW3_SAM_C1

5.8x - 28.0x

使用方法 : 已整合进压缩包内
Instructions : Inside the compressed file

相同倍率可通用的瞄具，请不要把它放进all_tanks里面。
用的时候，请注意对照检查炮手瞄准镜缩放倍率。
Same magnification universal . Please do not put it in all_tanks
When using, please pay attention to checking the magnification of the gunner's sight

Sadly I can't upload the original image since its NSFW but I found this cool artist that draws a lot of potential future sights :D This sight is kinda rushed since it was taking so long and I my patience was running thin.

((If you're actually going to use the sight I advise you use the smaller one as the bigger one is kinda hard to see in.))
